welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hammond, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, lively arts scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport houses all domestic and international flight operations.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and United Express.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Porter County Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.
